attributes.review: kept talking about some dog?? i guess the dog ate some soup then what happened was bizarre. the dog was barking like “wup” “wup” “eer”. it’s crazy cause the soup went to her brain. now she’s got a lot to say! she called me a “brown cow” (i think that was racist??) she also kept saying “hey joe! whaddaya know?” she really do be speaking doe. - brown cow
